CREATE TABLE "Pets" (
    "Id" integer GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY,
    "Name" text NOT NULL,
    "Type" integer NOT NULL,
    "CheckedIn" boolean NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Pets" PRIMARY KEY ("Id")
);

CREATE TABLE "Reservations" (
    "Id" integer GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY,
    "RoomType" integer NOT NULL,
    "ExpectedCheckInTime" timestamp with time zone NOT NULL,
    "CheckInTime" timestamp with time zone NULL,
    "CheckOutTime" timestamp with time zone NULL,
    "PetId" integer NOT NULL,
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Reservations" PRIMARY KEY ("Id"),
    CONSTRAINT "FK_Reservations_Pets_PetId" FOREIGN KEY ("PetId") REFERENCES "Pets" ("Id") ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE INDEX "IX_Reservations_PetId" ON "Reservations" ("PetId");
